channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Selection tasks Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Selection tasks Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-30967|2024-08-03T07:03:39.855Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20selection%20tasks%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Selection tasks Plugin 1.0 and earlier does not escape the name and description of Script Selection task variable parameters on views displaying parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.
